      • getBounds

        public Polygon getBounds()
        Description copied from interface: ElevationChunk
        Returns the bounds of the chunk. The bounds shall be a quadrilateral polygon, with no holes. The exterior ring shall have 5 points, where the last point is equal to the first point.
        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface ElevationChunk

      • sample

        public boolean sample​(double[] lla,
                      int off,
                      int len)
        Description copied from interface: ElevationChunk
        Bulk fetch of samples. Returns true if all missing samples were fetched, false otherwise. Elevation will be queried for all HAE values in the array that are Double.NaN.
        Specified by:
        sample in interface ElevationChunk
        Parameters:
        lla - The point array, in ordered Longitude, Latitude, Altitude HAE triplets.
